pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Magnesium 120 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Magnesium is made from a premium quality formula containing a bioavailable form of magnesium (citrate) for a physically active lifestyle.

Benefits: Swisse Ultiboost Magnesium is a premium quality formula containing a bioavailable form of magnesium (citrate) to support a physically active lifestyle. Factors such as diet and excess alcohol intake may also reduce magnesium levels.

Absorption: Formulated with a bioavailable form of magnesium (citrate) to help optimise absorption.

Muscle Cramp Relief: Magnesium provides relief and helps reduce the occurrence of muscle cramps when dietary intake is inadequate. It also supports healthy muscle function and relaxation.

Relieves Mild Muscle Spasms: Magnesium helps relieve and reduce mild muscle spasms and twitches when dietary intake is inadequate.

Nervous System & Adrenal Gland Support: Magnesium helps support a healthy nervous system. It also assists adrenal gland health, which helps regulate the body's physiological response to stress and supports stress recovery.

Energy Production: Magnesium aids the digestion of carbohydrates and fats to help convert them into energy.

Heart Health Support: Sufficient levels of magnesium help support heart health and maintain a healthy cardiovascular system.

Product Claims: No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg or artificial flavour.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian

Size: 120 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains:  Magnesium (from magnesium citrate) 150mg

Contains: Soya beans.

Allergen Contains: Soybean

Allergen Free From: Artificial Flavours| Egg| Gluten| Lactose| Yeast

Directions

Adult Dosage:
General Health: One tablet daily.
Muscle cramp & mild muscle spasm relief: Two tablets daily.
Or as directed by a healthcare professional. Take during or immediately after a meal.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C. Do not use if cap seal is broken.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Swisse is a carbon neutral company. Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
